programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Earth to Bose: Strange things start to happen to Bose when he finds himself in love with an alien. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: No Country for Old Mentors: Despite hoping to be matched with her favourite next-gen hero in the Superhero Mentor Program, Phoebe chooses her dad, and soon regrets it. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Date Expectations: A desperate Phoebe distracts Max from interfering with her class project by convincing him that a girl wants to go out with him. But then they seek revenge! (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Time Jerker: When Kid Danger and Captain Man battle the Time Bandit, Kid Danger accidentally falls into the Time Bandit's time machine and relives the same day over again. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Secret Beef: With an invitation to Swellview's most exclusive restaurant, Henry decides to take his boss, Ray, but finds it more complicated than expected. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Mind Games: Anika and Jennie try to get to the bottom of the mysterious VR headsets. Oliver, Florian and Jasmyn are in for a shock of their own when they pay a visit to Florian's house. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Charlie The Cat: Everything is ready for the Cat Show, but the Buffycats are missing a show host. By chance they meet Charlie The Cat, who really seems to be perfect for the job. (S2, ep 29)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Kite Contest: The Buffycats have built their kite and are ready for the annual kite contest. The spiteful Boss is also taking part in the competition, ready to get the better of it. (S2, ep 30)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: A Stinky Mission: At the restaurant Meatball meets the stinky cat Gas, who says he is tired of living in the trash bin of the alley. Meatball offers to help him find a new home. (S2, ep 31)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best is mistaken for a notorious jewel thief in 'Mugshot', then in 'Taken to the Cleaners', Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing. (S1, ep 15)

programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to join the extreme sports team The Drasticals in 'Extreme Spots', and then in 'Squirrel Record', Sandy finds a book of world records and tries to break them all!

programme.desc: Ruby and Zokie try to find what shady business Grandpa Pearl is actually into in 'Full Shade', and in 'Who's Your Daddy?', Zokie packs a lifetime of memory-making experiences into one day. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Sonic Prime

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: For Your Spies Only: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without supervision. When Jinx finds the Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: No Friend In Sight: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle over her. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry's Frittle Problem: When Henry's dad gets an offer for a new job, Henry and Ray go undercover to try and stop Henry's dad from getting the job and prevent Henry from having to move. (S4, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toddler Invasion: When The Toddler takes control of the Man Cave, Charlotte and Jasper have to find a way to sneak into the Man Cave and free Kid Danger and Captain Man. (S4, ep 16)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob befriends a talking Krabby Patty whose only wish is to be eaten in 'My Friend Patty', then in 'Fun-Believable', Rube explores little known oddities and attractions around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his spatula reforged in 'Spatula of the Heavens', and then in 'Gary's Playhouse', SpongeBob builds a snail-house for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave is concerned that The Chipmunks have become obsessed a video game in 'Mystic Mountain', and in 'Candy Confessions', Alvin wants a skateboard but Theodore uses the money to buy sweets. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin is convinced his mojo was in a cap he gave away in 'Mojo Missing', then in 'Who's The Animal', Alvin finds himself mistaken for a Tasmanian devil during a costume visit to the zoo. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf in 'Reaching for the Stars', then in 'The Dream Team', Handy puts together an A-team to get his jet pack back from Gargamel's hovel. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy discovers the forest in 'The Tour', and then in 'Smurfing a Masterpiece', Baby Smurf is the new Painter! (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The kids try to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal in 'Dine and Bash', then in 'Sofa, So Good', the kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning. (S6, ep 8)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge in 'The Last Laugh', then in 'Driver's Dread', Leni looks for alternative ways to get her driver's licence. (S6, ep 9)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Hello Bikini Bottom!: A concert promoter wants to send SpongeBob and Squidward on the road, until greedy Mr. Krabs decides to manage them - and their "world tour" - himself!

programme.title: Legends of the Hidden Temple
programme.desc: Three siblings embark on a temple tour only to discover the legends behind it are real. They must navigate a series of booby-trapped rooms to lift the temple's curse and escape with their lives.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Too Much Information: At a Milk Shack photo exhibition, the group can't stop telling the truth - whether they want to or not! The gang must evade Raquel before they tell her everything. (S2, ep 18)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: For Your Spies Only: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without supervision. When Jinx finds the Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: No Friend In Sight: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle over her. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Massage Chair: When Captain Man shows up with a cool new massage chair, Henry, Charlotte, and Jasper compete in a series of physical and mental challenges to see who wins the chair. (S5, ep 20)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Pipers: Henry gets an unexpected visitor claiming to be from the future. When a boy-robot arrives, The Gang must find a way to save everyone from an apocalyptic future. (S5, ep 23)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Beck's Big Break: Tori accidentally gets Beck fired from a small role in a movie, then must find a way to get him his job back. Meanwhile, Robbie has nightmares about Rex. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Hike A Pose: Does making people jealous of your awesome trip make you popular? It's the long weekend in Mapleview, and everyone has fabulous trips planned except for Lydia and Julie. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Return of the Kid: Henry Hart's back and stealing Ray's attention from crime fighting, so Danger Force is forced to go on a bunch of exhausting missions without Captain Man! (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Vidja Games: Danger Force and Captain Man get hooked making celebrity videos to start raking in cash. But then they accidentally send out a video that reveals their secret identities! (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thunder Van: Hank brings the Thundervan for Phoebe to continue her superhero training, but when the kids take a joyride, Hank gives them a ride they will never forget. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Four Supes and a Baby: Phoebe drags Billy and Nora to the park to meet her crush and his baby brother. When Max takes the younger kids home, they accidentally grab the wrong one! (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Space Rock: Trouble follows Henry home from his superhero life when a piece of rock from outer space turns out to be more than it seems. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Birthday Girl Down: Henry is not invited to a party because he is accused of throwing the birthday girl off the roof the previous year. Captain Man helps Henry clear his name. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Seashell: On a volcanic island that has recently opened to the public, the gang finds a talking shell that encourages them to indulge in their fantasies. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Treasure Map: Taylor meets a gold prospector with half a map of Rock Island. Uncle Charlie's journal warns that Rock Island's gold mustn't be removed, so Taylor's determined to protect it. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Play Dirty
programme.desc: 1969. War. Director: André De Toth. Stars Michael Caine, Nigel Davenport & Nigel Green. A fuel expert is ordered to guide a tough band of convicts across the desert to destroy an enemy fuel depot. [S]

programme.title: The Moderns
programme.desc: 1988. Drama. Director: Alan Rudolph. Stars Keith Carradine, Linda Fiorentino & Wallace Shawn. In 1920s Paris, a struggling artist's life takes an unexpected turn when he agrees to forge paintings. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: The End and the Beginning. 1964. Narrator: Sir Ralph Richardson. It's 1945. The enemy falls into the Allies hands. The leaders meet and it's V.E. Day. Russia joins the Allies in the war on Japan. [S]

programme.title: Race For The Yankee Zephyr
programme.desc: 1981. Action. Director: David Hemmings. Stars Ken Wahl, Lesley Ann Warren & Donald Pleasence. Local hunters compete with a gang of mercenaries to find a missing plane with a cargo of $50 million. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout July. [S]

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The New Planet. 1963. Stars Dick Vosburgh & Ronnie Stevens. A new planet beyond the orbit of Pluto is discovered, where a race of giants seize Captain Dart as a pet and use the ship as home decor. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Come Back, Shame. 1966. Stars Adam West, Burt Ward & Cliff Robertson. Batman and Robin reckon something's up when Shame steals Grimaldi Smith's hot racing car in the middle of the Gotham City 500. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Conjurer. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, George Pastell & Riggs O'Hara. Ali, a Saracen youth with a flair for conjuring tricks, is ordered to infiltrate Richard's camp to assassinate the monarch. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: The Phantom Piper. 1961. Stars Graydon Gould, David Graham & George Murcell. The Supercar team heads to Scotland to investigate reports of a ghostly bagpiper. [S]

programme.title: The Cat Gang
programme.desc: 1958. Adventure. Directed by Darrel Catling. Stars Francesca Annis, John Pike, Jeremy Bulloch & John Gabriel. Three children and their adventures while on the track of a gang of smugglers. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Trapped. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Laurence Hardy, John Arnatt. Robin brings justice down on landowner Sir Hugo de Basque, who uses poor trespassers as slave labour if they can't pay his fines. [S]

programme.title: War of the Planets
programme.desc: 1977. Sci-fi. Directed by Alfonso Brescia. Stars John Richardson & Yanti Somer. Captain Alex Hamilton and his crew discover an enslaved planet while investigating a strange signal in space. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: Echo. 1959. Stars John Newland, Ross Martin & Ed Kemmer. When Paul Martin is acquitted the murder of his wife, he moves to the country. However, he begins to have premonitions of his own murder. [S]

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Codename Europa. 1968. Stars Ed Bishop, Francis Matthews & Donald Gray. The Mysterons vow to assassinate the Triumvirate of Europe - the three most powerful men on Earth after the World President.

programme.title: The October Man
programme.desc: 1947. Crime. Director: Roy Ward Baker. Stars: John Mills, Edward Chapman, Joan Greenwood. A man is suspected of murder, and due to a previous brain injury, he begins to doubt his own innocence. [S]

programme.title: The Day Will Dawn
programme.desc: 1942. War. Director: Harold French. Stars Deborah Kerr, Ralph Richardson & Hugh Williams. A British foreign correspondent, forced out of Norway, returns to the occupied Scandinavian country. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Counting Heads
programme.desc: 1961. An account of the ten-yearly census - the first record in colour of the entire operation.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: The Revolver. 1960. Stars Rupert Davies, Ewen Solon & Margaretta Scott. Maigret is faced with a strange situation when his revolver is stolen and seems likely to be used for attempted murder. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1971. A Hero's Welcome. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. Christmas 1941. Peter struggles with the image he has cultivated of his father, souring their relationship. (S2, E08) [S]

programme.title: Mickey One
programme.desc: 1965. Crime. Directed by Arthur Penn. Stars Warren Beatty, Alexandra Stewart & Hurd Hatfield. A stand-up comic incurs the wrath of the Mafia and escapes to Chicago but yearns to go back on stage. [S]

programme.title: She Played with Fire
programme.desc: 1958. Drama. Directed by Sidney Gilliat. Stars Jack Hawkins, Ian Hunter, Arlene Dahl & Dennis Price. An investigator finds himself involved in blackmail and murder after running into his ex. [S]

programme.title: Bullet Scars
programme.desc: 1942. Crime Drama. Directed by D. Ross Lederman. Stars Regis Toomey, Adele Longmire & Howard Da Silva. A doctor and a nurse are forced to treat a wounded gangster who was injured during a robbery. [S]

programme.title: Bullet Scars
programme.desc: 1942. Crime Drama. Directed by D. Ross Lederman. Stars Regis Toomey, Adele Longmire & Howard Da Silva. A doctor and a nurse are forced to treat a wounded gangster who was injured during a robbery. [S]

programme.title: The Golden Disc
programme.desc: 1958. Pop drama starring Lee Patterson, Mary Steele, Terry Dene & Linda Gray. A young pop composer and singer opens a coffee bar. They are joined by budding singer Terry Dene as himself. [S]

programme.title: Somewhere in Camp
programme.desc: 1942. Comedy. Directed by John E. Blakeley. Stars Harry Korris, Frank Randle & Robbie Vincent. Army buddies help Private Trevor court the daughter of their commanding officer. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Dave Storm and The Diamonds perform the sensational hit 'If You Gotta Make a Fool of Somebody'.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Annual Agricultural Show/Pheasant Shooting. 1981. Jack visits an agricultural show to watch a display of trade carts before going on to a pheasant shoot at Gurston Down near Salisbury Plain. [S]

programme.title: Forces' Sweetheart
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy directed by Maclean Rogers. Three goofy soldiers played by Harry Secombe, Michael Bentine and Freddie Frinton vie for the affections of the lovely Judy, the ENSA-tainer. [S]

programme.title: Blackout
programme.desc: 1950. Crime Noir. Director: Robert S Baker. Written by John Gilling. Stars Maxwell Reed & Dinah Sheridan. An ambulance drops a blind patient to the wrong address, where he stumbles over a body. [S]

programme.title: The Battle of the Rails
programme.desc: 1946. War. Directed by René Clément. Stars Marcel Barnault & Jean Clarieux. The story of the brave railroad workers in the French Resistance and their efforts to sabotage the Germans during WWII. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Duke Steals a Wife. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Irene Ryan & Donna Douglas. Jed and his dog Duke are both feeling down without a woman in their lives, until they see a French woman and her poodle. [S]

programme.title: Desert Sands
programme.desc: 1955. Action. Directed by Lesley Selander. Stars Ralph Meeker, Marla English & J. Carrol Naish. Legionnaires must deal with an uprising in North Africa but are captivated by an Arabian princess. [S]

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge
programme.desc: A Fishy Tale. 1980. Stars Jon Pertwee, Joan Sims & Sarah Thomas. After learning about fishing, Worzel puts on his 'wangling' head and tries catching the goldfish in Mrs Bloomsbury-Barton's pond. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Come Back, Shame. 1966. Stars Adam West, Burt Ward & Cliff Robertson. Batman and Robin reckon something's up when Shame steals Grimaldi Smith's hot racing car in the middle of the Gotham City 500. [S]

programme.title: Yellow Sky
programme.desc: 1948. Western. Directed by William Wellman. Stars Gregory Peck, Anne Baxter & Richard Widmark. Outlaws seeking refuge find a ghost town inhabited by a girl and her grandfather who have found gold. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: 1964. English rock and pop band The Hollies perform the wonderful hit Little Lover.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood

programme.title: Out of Town

programme.desc: We take a trip to the Cotswolds in 1948, look at Alexandra Palace and the birth of television in 1936, Noel has a very interesting reel about a ladder, and do you remember milk machines? [S]

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend

programme.title: Look At Life Trouble Shooters

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club

programme.title: DinoCity

programme.title: DinoCity

programme.title: Molang

programme.title: Molang

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Other Tribe: In Prehistory, Molang and Piu Piu are part of a very civil and educated tribe. After they were designated to go get some food, they meet a much more rustic tribe... (S5 Ep52)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Life Is Beautiful: In the Middle Age, Molang and Piu Piu can be counted on to entertain the king. Even when he's sad? Fortunately, our two friends know exactly what to do to cheer him up! (S5 Ep1)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Five Stars: In Prehistory, Molang and Piu Piu meet an alien who has come to observe them. But the most evolved one isn't the one we think! (S5 Ep2)

programme.title: The Miniwhats

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Strange Story: Ollie draws a very large book for Raoul, who has to write a story for school but doesn't know how. They go into the book, and jump from story to story. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Super Granny Market: Mustard doesn't have a grandmother to make him snacks. The others feel bad for him, so Ollie draws him a super-granny market. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Nightmares Out Of The Blue: Pamela is going to have to wear glasses... but it's better than being blind! What is it like to not be able to see anything? (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Clock That Turned Back Time: The MiniWhats think that in the future, there will be flying cars. Ollie draws them one, and off they go! (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Min's Dino Mite Mistake: On their first visit to the Dino Port, the excited Dino Mites are harder to control than Min anticipated. (S2 Ep44)

programme.desc: Let It Snow: The Yodies bring ice and snow to Tulipop, and Maddy struggles to ice-skate. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Tulipop
programme.desc: Sunny Spells: Gloomy's weather spell backfires, causing Tulipop's weather to go wild! (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Tulipop
programme.desc: Butterflying: Gloomy's magic makes butterflies enormous, leading to an unexpected ride. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Pumpkin Mania: Bubble supersizes the hotel pumpkins to make her guest happy - but her magic might have gone too far when a runaway pumpkin breaks free and starts destroying the room. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Room at the Top: When Bubble tries to climb up a mountain with her guest, Hilary, as fast as possible, they wind up on the wrong path with a yeti in pursuit. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: Hino Tari Hullabaloo: True must save the Fundawunda Festival from falling into adorable chaos as a cute baby chick's magical kiss transforms fairgoers into baby chicks themselves. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Esme and Roy
programme.desc: Knight Rider: Esme and Roy take Tillie out for a bike ride. But when Tillie falls off her bike, it's up to the Monstersitters to help her regain her courage. (S2 Ep42)

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy Compilations
programme.desc: No Better Fly Than A Butterfly / Do The Vampire / Before You Go / Brush Your Teeth: Jeremy and Jazzy celebrate self-respect, friendship and support while learning about the world. (S1 Ep102)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Catboy's Magic Trick: Determined to perform a magic trick, Connor finds an ancient teleporting sarcophagus. (S5 Ep17)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Gekko The Croc: Gekko is forced to be a sneaky crocodile instead of a loyal lizard because Pharaoh Boy has taken his friends prisoner. (S5 Ep18)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: The Camping Trip: Greg feels scared on an overnight camping trip. He thinks his night-time powers will help him but Orticia has something worrying in store. (S5 Ep19)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Pondweed Party: Orticia gets invited to Octobella's cave to help grow powerful pondweed. (S5 Ep20)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Rock-a-Bye Baby: Marsh wishes he had a little brother or sister and Tiny comes up with an idea - she paints faces on some rocks and tells Marsh these can be his little brother and sister! (S3 Ep31)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Mystery Hunters: When word of a Muddy Monster reaches the dinos, Mazu is determined to "find" it. She doesn't think it exists and wants to find out what's behind it and scaring everyone. (S3 Ep32)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: News of the Day: A journalist has announced that the person who makes the most interesting report about the life of the city will appear on TV. Ricky goes searching for local news. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Dreaming about Space: Grandpa Saur has always dreamed of some extraordinary adventure! For many years, grandfather has been looking in a telescope in the hope of spotting an alien. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Ricky the Chameleon: Boo has his dad's wildlife photography cloak. It lets you camouflage with any environment. Ricky has talked his friend into lending him the camouflage cloak for a day. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: In The Belly: After a wave took them, Molang an Piu Piu think they are stranded on an island. But they meet a friend that tells them they're actually in a whale's stomach! (S5 Ep50)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Genie: Molang and Piu Piu find a magic lamp. A genie appears and offers to grant them three wishes, but the two friends have very different wishes... (S5 Ep51)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Other Tribe: In Prehistory, Molang and Piu Piu are part of a very civil and educated tribe. After they were designated to go get some food, they meet a much more rustic tribe... (S5 Ep52)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Life Is Beautiful: In the Middle Age, Molang and Piu Piu can be counted on to entertain the king. Even when he's sad? Fortunately, our two friends know exactly what to do to cheer him up! (S5 Ep1)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Five Stars: In Prehistory, Molang and Piu Piu meet an alien who has come to observe them. But the most evolved one isn't the one we think! (S5 Ep2)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Voyage In The Clouds: Pamela is learning to fly by jumping on the trampoline when a bird grabs her and takes her off into the air. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Strange Story: Ollie draws a very large book for Raoul, who has to write a story for school but doesn't know how. They go into the book, and jump from story to story. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Super Granny Market: Mustard doesn't have a grandmother to make him snacks. The others feel bad for him, so Ollie draws him a super-granny market. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Nightmares Out Of The Blue: Pamela is going to have to wear glasses... but it's better than being blind! What is it like to not be able to see anything? (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Clock That Turned Back Time: The MiniWhats think that in the future, there will be flying cars. Ollie draws them one, and off they go! (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Herds of a Feather: After a mixed-up by Miguel results in a baby t-rex hatching at the Dino Airport, Miguel seeks to help the little dinosaur find his place among the airport team. (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
programme.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.

programme.title: Cool It Carol!
programme.desc: A young couple journey to Swinging London in search of fame and fortune. But with work scarce, they get drawn into the seedy world of modelling and sex work. Contains 70s social attitudes.

programme.title: Reel Stories
programme.desc: Cinema projectionists make magic with light. As digital projection makes them obsolete, this film records the working lives of projectionists in the heyday of this dying art.
